project.name: Generative AI Webpage Enhancer
project.description: A project that enhances webpage content dynamically using GPT-3.5, providing personalized text based on user-defined contexts.

scripts.name: json_text_extractor.py
scripts.description: Extracts text fields and parent types from JSON.

scripts.name: contextual_text_generator.py
scripts.description: Generates new text based on user-defined context using GPT-3.5.

scripts.name: update_json_content.py
scripts.description: Updates the original JSON content with the newly generated text.

visualization.description: Displays the enhanced content and user interface.

features: Dynamic text generation based on context
challenges: Optimizing performance for real-time text generation
futureImprovements: Add user authentication for personalized experiences
Implement caching for frequently used contexts
Explore additional AI models for text generation
